Fly, Inspiring, Shambling, Life Leech (5), CS(2)

The Well of Souls pulls the life force from the enemy and feeds the Abyssal army.

When the Well of Souls is given an order, it may put up to 20 points of damage on itself. However, this cannot take it to more than 20 damage in total. For each point of damage taken in this way, it may remove one point of damage from a friendly non-Allied unit within 9". The Well of Souls will not take a nerve test for damage taken in this way.

Individual, Stealthy, Siren's Call: This is a Wind Blast (8) spell, but moves the target unit towards the Siren rather than away (for example, if the Siren is in the enemy's front arc then it will move forwards rather than backwards). Any enemy unit hit with the Wind Blast spell is automatically Disordered during its next turn. Units with the Shambling special rule cannot be targetted by Siren's Call.

*When this unit attacks an enemy unit in melee, it may opt to use the enemy's profile for its melee attacks instead of its own. If it does so then it uses the enemy unit's Melee stat, Attacks stat and Crushing Strength value for that turn instead of its own. Any magical artefacts the enemy units has are ignored. The Dopplegangers themselves may still use a magic artefact as normal if they have one (apply any bonuses granted after the decision on which stats to use).

artifacts.name: Fire-oil
artifacts.rules:
Against units with the Regeneration rule
this unit gains an additional Piercing (1)
on �normal� ranged attacks, and Crushing
Strength (1) in melee.

artifacts.name: Mace of Crushing
artifacts.rules:
Whenever the unit rolls to damage in melee, it can re-roll one of
the dice that failed to damage.

artifacts.name: War-bow of Kaba
artifacts.rules: The unit has a ranged attack for which you roll a single die, regardless of the Attacks value of the unit. This attack has a range of 24� and, when rolling to hit, the unit uses a basic Ra value of 4+, regardless of its actual Ra value. The roll to hit is affected as normal by to-hit modifiers, and if a hit is scored, it is resolved at Piercing (1).

artifacts.name: Kevinar�s Flying Hammer
artifacts.rules: The unit has a ranged attack for which you roll a single die, regardless of the Attacks value of the unit. This attack has a range of 12� and always hits on 4+, regardless of modifiers, and if a hit is scored, it is resolved at Piercing (2).

artifacts.name: Blade of Slashing
artifacts.rules: Whenever the unit rolls to hit in Melee, it can re-roll one of the dice that failed to hit.

artifacts.name: Piercing Arrow
artifacts.rules: Whenever the unit rolls to damage with a 'normal' ranged attack, it can re-roll one of the dice that failed to damage.

artifacts.name: Quicksilver Rapier
artifacts.rules: This unit has +1 to hit when attacking individuals in melee.

artifacts.name: Myrddin�s Amulet of the Fire-heart
artifacts.rules: Once per game, after using a ranged attack or spell, this unit may immediately use another different ranged attack or spell it possesses, against the same or a different target.

artifacts.name: Dwarven Ale
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Headstrong special rule.

artifacts.name: Brew of Haste
artifacts.rules: The unit has +1 Speed.

artifacts.name: Pipes of Terror
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Brutal special rule.

artifacts.name: Brew of Courage
artifacts.rules: When testing Nerve against this unit, the enemies suffer an additional -1 to their total.

artifacts.name: Inspiring Talisman
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has the Inspiring special rule.

artifacts.name: Maccwar�s Potion of the Caterpillar
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Pathfinder special rule.

artifacts.name: Helm of Confidence
artifacts.rules: You must always reroll a rout result for this unit even if they are not in range of a unit with inspiring.

artifacts.name: Blade of the Beast Slayer
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has Crushing Strength (2) when attacking large infantry, large cavalry, monsters or heroes who do not have the Individual special rule. If the Hero already has Crushing Strength, it is increased by 2 when attacking those same targets.

artifacts.name: Darklord�s Onyx Ring
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes with the Regeneration rule. The units Regeneration value is increased by 1. For example, a unit with Regeneration (5+) now has Regeneration (4+).

artifacts.name: Blessing of the Gods
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Elite special rule.

artifacts.name: Chant of Hate
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Vicious special rule.

artifacts.name: Scarletmaw�s Fenulian Amulet
artifacts.rules: Units with the Lightning Bolt spell only. This item increases the unit�s Lightning Bolt (n) value by 2. For example, Lightning Bolt (3) becomes Lightning Bolt (5).

artifacts.name: Kaba�s Holy Hand Grenades
artifacts.rules: The unit has a ranged attack for which you roll a single die, regardless of the Attacks value of the unit. This attack has a range of 12� and always hits on 4+, regardless of modifiers. The attack also has the Blast (D6) and Piercing (2) special rule.

artifacts.name: Crepognon�s Scrying Gem of Zellak
artifacts.rules: When starting to deploy their units, your opponent must deploy D3+1 units instead of a single one.

artifacts.name: Boots of Levitation
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero can Advance and then shoot as if it had Halted that turn. It can also move At the Double and shoot as if it had Advanced that turn.

artifacts.name: Brew of Strength
artifacts.rules: The unit has Crushing Strength (1), or if the unit already has Crushing Strength, it is increased by 1.

artifacts.name: Healing Charm
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has the Heal (3) spell.

artifacts.name: The Boomstick
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has the Lightning Bolt (3) special rule.

artifacts.name: Mreb�s Grimoire of Unspeakable Darkness
artifacts.rules: Units with the Surge spell only. This item increases the unit�s Surge (n) value by 4. For example, Surge (8) becomes Surge (12).

artifacts.name: Diadem of Dragon-kind
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Breath Attack (10) special rule.

artifacts.name: Heart-seeking Chant
artifacts.rules:
The unit�s ranged attacks and spells have the Piercing
(1) special rule, or if the unit already has Piercing, it is increased by 1.

artifacts.name: Jar of the Four Winds
artifacts.rules: The unit�s �normal� ranged attacks gain 12� to their maximum range.

artifacts.name: Orcsbain�s Amulet of Thorns
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Phalanx special rule.

artifacts.name: Ensorcelled Armour
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero's Defence is improved by 1, to a maximum of 6+.

artifacts.name: Boots of the Seven Leagues
artifacts.rules:
This artefact can only be used by a Hero with the
Individual special rule. The Hero has the Vanguard
special rule.

artifacts.name: The Fog
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Stealthy special rule.

artifacts.name: Medallion of Life
artifacts.rules: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has the Regeneration(5+) special rule.

artifacts.name: Wine of Elvenkind
artifacts.rules: The unit has the Nimble special rule.

artifacts.name: Wings of Honeymaze
artifacts.rules:
This artefact can only be used by a Hero with the
Individual special rule. The Hero has the Fly special rule and increases his speed to 10.

artifacts.name: Brew of Sharpness
artifacts.rules: The unit has +1 to hit in melee.

artifacts.name: Brew of Keen-eyeness
artifacts.rules: The unit has +1 to hit with �normal� ranged attacks.

artifacts.name: Crystal Pendant of Retribution
artifacts.rules: When the unit is Routed, all units in base contact with it suffer 2D6 hits at Piercing (3). These hits are resolved by the player that Routed the unit with the Crystal, which now has to (grudgingly, we�re sure) resolve the hits against his own unit(s). After the damage has been resolved, no Nerve test is taken by the damaged units � they proceed to Regroup, but cannot move directly forward D6� for their Regroup action, deterred by the huge explosion.
